resources.string:
This app is made by fans to fans.
 Try to share this app to help us spread the word.

 I will try to keep this app updated as much as possible.

 Contact me at

By sending a donation to the developer, it will help to keep the app clean and without ads. Your contribution means a huge deal, with this help I will make sure to focus and keep the app always updated.
By choosing this option you will help the developer with the amount of:
Your contribution means a lot!\nThanks very much!
